Question
========

Of 7 subjects, before and after a given effort of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 7 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 32 and the standard deviation is 40. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.55
* 2.12
* 2.69
* 17.99

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.55: Incorrect
* 2.12: Correct
* 2.69: Incorrect
* 17.99: Incorrect
